com.github.jonathanxd.iutils.box

Class ImmutableBox<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.jonathanxd.iutils.box.ImmutableBox<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - Type of value.
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    BaseBox<T>, UnknownBox<T>, java.lang.Comparable<BaseBox<T>>

    public final class ImmutableBox<T>
extends java.lang.Object
implements BaseBox<T>
    A box that hold reference cannot be changed.

        public static <T> ImmutableBox<T> of(T value)
